title.narrative: Procurement of office equipment to support delivery of Social Cash Transfers to poor and vulnerable households in Zambia

description.narrative: This activity (Procurement of office equipment to support delivery of Social Cash Transfers to poor and vulnerable households in Zambia) is a component of Zambia Social Protection Expansion Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of goods' and a budget of £5,276,112. This component benefits Zambia, and works in the following sector(s): Social Protection. , with the following implementing partners: AECOM, Crown Agents Limited. The start date is 01-05-2010 and the end date is 30-06-2018.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
